amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the East-West Center, the Dante B. Fascell North-South Center, and the Asia Foundation.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 6 printed in Part B of H. Rept. 106-235 to reduce funding to the fiscal year 1998 levels of $12 million for the Center for Cultural and Technical Interchange between East and West, $1.5 million for the Dante B. Fascell North-South Center, and $8 million for the Asia Foundation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 237, 1 Present (Roll no. 313).
